name: [L] Shingeki No Zombie
description:
You kill zombies using "pinball machine" like physics.

Gameplay recorded: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zC-Mq2fZhGQ

Controls: Arrows + Space

Game made in team of 2 people:

Krzysztof Orzędowski (C# scripting in Unity, sounds)

Justyna Miętkiewska (Graphics, Animation)
